name: HOG: Hands on Goblins
description:
Hands on goblins!

This page is a proof of concept of the main (and only) combat mechanic of the game HOG: Hands on Goblins (in early stages of development).

Game concept

Just a simple (telekinetic) mechanic: pull and push

... and goblins!

Controls

WASD - Move

Spacebar - Jump

Left click - Push

Right click - Pull

Esc - Exit

P - Pause

R - Restart

Can hold a bit on push/pull to increase the speed of the objects.

How to launch
  • Linux: execute the *.x86_64 file (from the terminal). You may have to add permissions to it.
  • Windows: execute the .exe file.
  • Mac: unzip the archive and then... well... I think there is an .app file to execute (?). No idea, really.

After some bugfixes, it has been tested on Linux and Windows and works flawlessly (until someone proves me wrong). Mac remains untested.
